name: Red & Blue: Craft Hero
description:
Red & Blue: Craft Hero is an addictive puzzle game where you have to embody both characters. Control both hero at the same time and use the buttons to move, push boxes, and collect coins to find enemies in the craft hero.

The mobs are invading craft world. Red hero and Blue hero are assigned an impossible mission. Sneak into the forest and kill them all.

Features:
• We will update new exciting challenges every week, helping you to experience different challenges, not get bored.
• Awesome animation and sound effects.
• Easy but addictive teamwork gameplay.
• Nice characters and design.
• Smooth control.
• Download the game completely for free.
How to play:
• Move Red hero and Blue hero by arrows and avoid obstacles. Red hero must avoid water while Blue hero must avoid fire.
• Just touch the button "Swap" to change from Blue hero to Red hero and vice versa
• Collect gems as much as possible.
Do not hesitate to download and play Red & Blue: Craft Hero - today's most popular puzzle game to participate in conquering exciting challenges. Have fun and get through quickly each challenging level in Red & Blue: Craft Hero.
